Articles.Content:
I am sure we have all noticed that while there is a high tech space center on kerbin, there are no cities. Where do the poor kerbals live?

It is time we took matters into our own hands! Give all of our brave, suicidal, kerbonauts homes! Build a city for them to live in!

Here is my own meagre settlement.

Pretty cool!

I\'ve always just assumed that they had advanced cities underground, unless Squad plans to add cities.
You sir Win
Suddenly, bombers overhead!

Suddenly, bombers overhead!

Heck no, there\'s enough danger from other houses that are trying to fly in! I definitely knocked out a few houses trying to land them in and had to abort the flights.
You should make factories with upside down SRB\'s as the chimney.

You should make factories with upside down SRB\'s as the chimney.

Or, an atmospheric engine at low throttle and lots of fuel (a working smokestack!)

Next: Build a city.

Nice village, though!

I\'ve always just assumed that they had advanced cities underground, unless Squad plans to add cities.

Same here. I think that Squad plans on procedurally-generated cities, though. Perhaps the lack of surface infrastructure and insistence upon living underground is due to a nuclear exchange sometime in the past...

Or, an atmospheric engine at low throttle and lots of fuel (a working smokestack!)

Mod the cfg to have no fuel consumption and no thrust

Very cool idea not long from now people will start editing stuff for 0.16 and making house shapes cannot be out of the picture? or at least panels, i think your little steps has great potential and is already pretty dam awesome , i might make my own to compare
Here are some large buildings that I have made. Both have interiors, but only the latter has a fully traversable interior.

i been working on bulidings 2! XD but when i do large ones (like your tower) i lag like crazy, i made a smaller one, about the size the ones in your base, and landing the third was a horrible battle against lag.

dont you lag like crazy with this?

i been working on bulidings 2! XD but when i do large ones (like your tower) i lag like crazy, i made a smaller one, about the size the ones in your base, and landing the third was a horrible battle against lag.

dont you lag like crazy with this?

Yeah, I lag a lot. The second building that I posted is way to laggy for me to use. I cut it in half, so I could actually use it.
Now we need an orbiting space hotel!

Same here. I think that Squad plans on procedurally-generated cities, though. Perhaps the lack of surface infrastructure and insistence upon living underground is due to a nuclear exchange sometime in the past...

They have an active space program with a history of crashes and explosions to rival any nuclear program and your first thought is because of nuclear war?

Now we need an orbiting space hotel!

I\'m intending to build a cathedral on the moon, but I am a bit daunted by how to get it there. More to come

dude i had the most F***ing crasy idea last night after i woke upscreaming.

a space ring around the mun useing mcjeb robotics

ITS EPIC AND ... i forgot the the rest but if you want to know more pm me

oh and im kinda alittal slow due to whut i think is a stroke... :\'(
oh and just so wer clear the ring is in orbit and made from 600 flights

They have an active space program with a history of crashes and explosions to rival any nuclear program and your first thought is because of nuclear war?

Maybe they\'re trying to go into space because of lingering radiation and they only crash so much because their past experience with spacecraft is DESIGNED to crash!
